title: South Pine Cafe - Grass Valley
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegan choices are clearly labeled. Serves breakfast, lunch and beer/wine at both locations; other one is in Nevada City. Dedicated to serving freshly prepared dishes. Whenever possible supports local farmers and vendors. All menu items are made in house, to order, with fresh and natural ingredients. Uses only organic tofu, and all fresh fruits and veggies for juices. Also offers organic, locally roasted Caroline's coffee.
